page.title: 13SPORT IN EXMOUTH
page.content:
The{Sports Centre}in Exmouth was completed in{October 1982. The sports available at the sports centre are{ GYMNASTICS,BADMINTON,SQUASH,SOCCER, TRAMPOLINING,SHORT TENNIS,KEEP FIT, LADIES ACTIVITY MORNING,MENS ACTIVITY MORNING AND 50+CLUB. The most popular sports are{ FIVE-A-SIDE FOOTBALL,TABLE TENNIS, SQUASH AND BADMINTON KNOCK OUT TOURNAMENT. { The{East Devon County Council}helps to pay for the sports centre's equipment.
Popular childrens games are{FOOTBALL, {NETBALL,CRICKET AND ROUNDERS. }
